tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Shruti Was Very helpful and Spontaneous with her Diagnosis and Treatment thereafter .  Procedure carried was very smooth .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cavity Filling,Teeth Whitening,Stained Teeth,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
The doctor is very approachable and post care is also great. Whenever I've had any emergencies, she has been quick to respond and tried to accommodate my schedule.

After my wisdom tooth extraction I was prescribed NSAIDs, after which I started feeling unwell. I immediately called the doctor, and she was quick to diagnose that I'm allergic to NSAIDs and put me on a different course immediately. 

I wouldn't have known of this if it wasn't for Dr Shruti's quick diagnosis. 

Their periodic reminders are also convenient and ensures good health of my teeth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Shruti explained the problem extremely clearly and did what was required only. I was in a lot of pain when I went and she promptly gave me appointment and ensured I went back home  relieved.  Also just to mention during this Covid period especially the entire clinic looked very clean n hygienic and all necessary precautions were taken by her to ensure patients wellbeing. Thanks a lot Shruti!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My 8 year old son declared after the visit  which included detecting and filling three fillings that “ Fillings and cavities don’t hurt at all “ 
This is a testament to Dr Shruti’s competence . 
 She explained the procedure and issues clearly to me ( as the  parent ), and thereafter proceeded to put my son completely at ease with her explanations and instructions to him 
Highly recommended !

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr Shruti Jain was extremely professional. She explained the procedure very well . Normally when I give my teeth imprints the mixture makes me nauseous so I told her about it. She took me through the procedure very calmly and put me at complete ease. Once the kit came the clinic called me up to schedule an appointment. Overall I have enjoyed the experience and now my children also go to Toothwise for their checkups.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Both, Dr Jain and Jhunjhunwala exemplify their field.  With a warm reception staff, approachable and professional dentists who work In concinnty, my kids had a very pleasant experience. Not to forget the extremely modest fee they charge. I highly recommend it, giving it five stars

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very good & reasonably priced treatment , doctors & team very courteous & ambience very rich & clean , they use latest equipments & materials for the crown. Fitting of crown perfect & very well aligned ad I had lower & upper crown both fixed together which took them only 20 minutes without my having to thru any pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor is very friendly in nature. She explain my problem very much calmly. Thank u for all your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Good thing about her is she reduces your fear for the problem.  And is gentle and polite .   Also explains the problem clearly.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a good experience visiting the doctor she treated nicely without giving any pain and for future treatment I would like to visit the same doctor again

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
